title: Grace Barnes: The Tutoring Hero

story.text: Grace Barnes discovers her ability to transmit knowledge telepathically while helping a struggling student with math homework.
She experiments with her powers by helping neighbors learn new recipes and fix broken gadgets, all without speaking a word.
A local school requests her help with a group of students falling behind. Grace successfully tutors the entire class simultaneously, in silence.
Word of her abilities spreads, and she is invited to give a silent lecture at the community center, which becomes a resounding success.
Local news stations catch wind of the 'Silent Super Tutor,' covering her story and interviewing those she has helped.
Grace sets up a quiet study zone in the park and hundreds show up. She assists each person, collectively elevating the community's knowledge.
Feeling fulfilled, Grace holds a silent tutoring session in the park, reflecting on the impact she's had and pondering her future ventures.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Grace knew that her journey was just beginning.
moral: Sharing knowledge can change lives in unimaginable ways.
